title: Baked Spinach and Feta Dip
ingredients: 1/2 cup (125 mL) Reduced-Fat Feta Cheese, crumbled
300 g Frozen Chopped Spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 package Knorr Vegetable Dry Soup Mix
steps: Chop green onion and mince garlic.
Mix all ingredients in 6 cup (1.5 L) casserole dish
Bake 35 min or until heated through
Serve with pita chips or other favourite dippers
notes: This is a test note dfsyhgfvh dfhygdfb

title: Black Forest Cake
steps: Egg + Sugar mix over Hot Water till fluffy and double
Add Flour and Cocoa Powder and fold in with whisk (don't over mix)
